record.description: Parabolic receiver and transmitter being tested by instructors in the University of Chicago's course in high frequency radio and microwaves. The course is given for the Army Signal Corps, the students being on inactive duty in the Signal Corps. Left to right: Receiving parabola, transmitting parabola connected to klystron and power supply. The parabolas are made of aluminum. In the background another piece of apparatus, an inductive output amplifier with a rhumbatron--with its power supply--also is in use.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
